thread.title_full: Abbi From 'Broad City' To Work At Clinton Hill Food Co-Op Monday

title: Abbi From 'Broad City' To Work At Clinton Hill Food Co-Op Monday
text:
Abbi From 'Broad City' To Work At Clinton Hill Food Co-Op Monday By Rosa Goldensohn | October 2, 2015 11:28am Twitter Facebook Email More Abbi, from Broad City, (played by Abbi Jacobson) will sling produce inside the co-op for its third season all day October 5 at 18 Putnam Ave. in Clinton Hill, according to the Mayor's Office of Film and TV and City Councilwoman Laurie Cumbo. Getty Images/Stringer/Stephen Lovekin 
The Greene Hill Food Co-op found itself a new member, at least for Monday. 
Abbi, from Broad City , (played by Abbi Jacobson) will sling produce inside the co-op for its third season all day Oct. 5 at 18 Putnam Ave. in Clinton Hill, according to the Mayor's Office of Film and TV and City Councilwoman Laurie Cumbo. 
"Abbi works at a food co-op," the film permit description reads, according to Cumbo's blog. 
Broad City officials did not immediately respond to requests for comment.
